description: I am a divorced father & I can't say that I love my kids enough. They're one of the greatest joys in my world. I am also a huge family person. I consider myself an artsy person and photography is a huge passion. I love the outdoors, fishing and hiking. I do love to travel. My favorite places to go are New York and Colorado. I have traveled outside of the states and would love to go back. I do like movies and theater but I am also okay with relaxing at home with a bag of popcorn by the fireplace.
